javax.servlet.sip

Interface DnsResolver


  • public interface DnsResolver
    Interface encapsulating DNS resolution. It resolves a TelURL or a SipURI that contains telephone numbers to SipURIs.

    An instance of this interface can be accessed through the ServletContext parameter named javax.servlet.sip.DnsResolver or it can be injected using the @Resource or @Inject annotations.

    Since:
    2.0

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean resolvesInternally(SipURI uri)
      Return true if the SipURI is addressed to the container itself.
      SipURI resolveToSipURI(URI uri)
      Resolve a TelURL or a SipURI with user=phone parameter to a SIP URI according to the procedures specified in RFC 3824 and RFC 6116.
      List<SipURI> resolveToSipURIs(URI uri)
      Resolve a TelURL or a SipURI with user=phone parameter to SIP URIs according to the procedures specified in RFC 3824 and RFC 6116.
      List<String> resolveToStrings(URI uri, String enumService)
      Resolve a TelURL or a SipURI with user=phone parameter to URIs according to the procedures specified in RFC 6116 for the specified enum service.
      String toEnum(URI uri)
      Get string representation of a TelURL or a SipURI in ENUM format, per RFC 6116.

    • Method Detail

      • toEnum

        String toEnum(URI uri)
        Get string representation of a TelURL or a SipURI in ENUM format, per RFC 6116.
        Parameters:
        uri - a TelURL or SipURI with a user=phone parameter
        Returns:
        ENUM formatted string.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the uri is null or does not represent a telephone number

      • resolvesInternally

        boolean resolvesInternally(SipURI uri)
        Return true if the SipURI is addressed to the container itself. Typically the container would compare the address and port of the listening endpoint to decide this.
        Parameters:
        uri - An instance of SipURI.
        Returns:
        True if the SipURI is addressed to the container, false otherwise.

      • resolveToSipURI

        SipURI resolveToSipURI(URI uri)
                       throws IOException
        Resolve a TelURL or a SipURI with user=phone parameter to a SIP URI according to the procedures specified in RFC 3824 and RFC 6116. Only SIP enumservice ("E2U+SIP") will be used for resolution. If there are multiple NAPTR records matching the SIP enum service, it returns the SIP URI with highest precedence by order and preference of NAPTR records.
        Parameters:
        uri - a TelURL or SipURI with a user=phone parameter
        Returns:
        Resolved SIP URI or null, if there is no resolved SIP URI.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the DNS resolution fails.
        IllegalArgumentException - if the uri is null or does not represent a telephone number

      • resolveToSipURIs

        List<SipURI> resolveToSipURIs(URI uri)
                              throws IOException
        Resolve a TelURL or a SipURI with user=phone parameter to SIP URIs according to the procedures specified in RFC 3824 and RFC 6116. Only SIP enumservice ("E2U+SIP") will be used for resolution. The returned Sip URIs are ordered first by order and then by preference of the NAPTR records.
        Parameters:
        uri - a TelURL or SipURI with a user=phone parameter
        Returns:
        Resolved SIP URIs or empty list, if there is no resolved SIP URI.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the DNS resolution fails.
        IllegalArgumentException - if the uri is null or does not represent a telephone number

      • resolveToStrings

        List<String> resolveToStrings(URI uri,
                            String enumService)
                              throws IOException
        Resolve a TelURL or a SipURI with user=phone parameter to URIs according to the procedures specified in RFC 6116 for the specified enum service. The enum services are listed in RFC 6118. The returned URIs are ordered first by order and then by preference of the NAPTR records.
        Parameters:
        uri - a TelURL or SipURI with a user=phone parameter
        enumService - Name of the enum service. Eg: "E2U+pres" or "E2U+email"
        Returns:
        Resolved URIs as strings or empty list, if there is no resolved URI.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the DNS resolution fails.
        IllegalArgumentException - if the uri is null or does not represent a telephone number
